mapper.update: update shop set shop_homepage = #{shop_homepage}, addr_bunzi = #{addr_bunzi} where shop_no = #{shop_no}
mapper.select: select s1.product_no, p1.product_name from shop_product s1 inner join product p1 on s1.product_no = p1.product_no where s1.shop_no = #{shop_no} order by p1.product_name
